channel.title: How to succesfully get players on my server?
channel.description: How can i get more players on my server? I don't wanna steal other players from other servers.

item.title: How to succesfully get players on my server?
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

[quote=“DarienM, post:4, topic:354538”]well try and get some of your friends on it, and vote everyday, if you can get like 2 votes in throughout a whole day, and you have like 6 friends on the server, who all vote, you can get like 100 votes throughout, a week, which will attract many people.

Also for when you do that, try and make an attractive banner, and try and say all the positive’s that other servers may not have, like ‘working godwars’, or something along those lines[/quote]
My friends = too lazy to vote, I tried going on major chatboxes to tell ppl to vote for my server lol.

drubrkletern:

you could also put it on your moparscape sig :), and if you have alot of posts, the better!

I did that

Read full topic
item.source: How to succesfully get players on my server?

item.title: How to succesfully get players on my server?
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

well try and get some of your friends on it, and vote everyday, if you can get like 2 votes in throughout a whole day, and you have like 6 friends on the server, who all vote, you can get like 100 votes throughout, a week, which will attract many people.

Also for when you do that, try and make an attractive banner, and try and say all the positive’s that other servers may not have, like ‘working godwars’, or something along those lines

Read full topic
item.source: How to succesfully get players on my server?

item.title: How to succesfully get players on my server?
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

DarienM:

advertise, like go to mmorpgtop100 list, or the runescape top 100, and enter your information and get people to vote, and others will join when they see your server

Well, I tried that, but I don’t have enough players voting for my server… And players complain that there aren’t more players on my server and they end up quitting because of the population… =/

Read full topic
item.source: How to succesfully get players on my server?
